name: Prawn Raisukaree
description: A fragrant coconut curry with prawns, peppers, red onion, and lime.

name: Chicken Raisukaree
description: Mild and aromatic coconut curry with chicken, coriander, and fresh lime.

name: Firecracker Prawn
description: Fiery hot curry with prawns, onions, peppers, and chillies.

name: Firecracker Chicken
description: Spicy and bold chicken curry with red chilies and a sweet-hot sauce.

name: Vegetable Katsu Curry
description: Crispy breaded aubergine and sweet potato with mild curry sauce.

name: Chicken Katsu Curry
description: Breaded chicken cutlet with Japanese-style mild curry sauce.

name: Beef Massaman Curry
description: Rich Thai-inspired curry with beef, potatoes, and peanuts.

name: Tofu Katsu Curry
description: Breaded tofu served with a mild curry sauce and rice.
